rows.label: tlk70000050_01_msg0002
rows.name:
Whoops! Sorry for staring
at you like that. I didn't
mean any offense by it.

rows.label: tlk70000050_01_msg0003
rows.name:
I was just thinking about how you all
seem to have such strong bonds of
friendship. Honestly, I'm a little jealous.

rows.label: tlk70000050_01_msg0004
rows.name:
I'm sure how well you all
know each other affects your
strength in battle, too.

rows.label: tlk70000050_01_msg0005
rows.name:
Maybe that's the secret to your power!
Friendship! Yeah! ...Er, ahem. I
didn't mean to say that out loud.

rows.label: tlk70000050_01_msg0006
rows.name:
To me, friendship is kind of like how
you mix together all sorts of ingredients
to make Aurium's classic dishes!

rows.label: tlk70000050_01_msg0007
